original_text: Then the Lord changed the wind to a very strong west wind. This wind lifted the locusts up and it blew them away into the Red Sea. Not one locust remained in all the country of Egypt.
korean_text: 여호와께서 돌이켜 강렬한 서풍을 불게 하사 메뚜기를 홍해에 몰아넣으시니 애굽 온 땅에 메뚜기가 하나도 남지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord changed the wind
to a very strong west wind
This wind lifted the locusts up

sentences.korean_translation: 단 한 마리의 메뚜기도 남지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: in all the country of Egypt
